name: myPM SCG Starter Data File
summary: Learn about .SCGS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A SCG definition is the configuration data used to process the .XLS or .XLSX data source file, populate the template file, and generate the output file. Configuration information includes project details, S curve options, S curve files, the data source map, and the data source filter.
NOTE: myPM SCG Starter requires an installation of Microsoft Excel.

description: Data file created by myPM SCG Starter, a program used to generate histograms, S curves, and project statistics from Excel data; contains one or more SCG definitions that can be modified.
